pages.text: Some quests require you to hand in images of specific entities or biomes.$(br)To take images, you need a Camera.
When taking an image, the camera will consume one piece of paper from your inventory. If there is no paper in your inventory, you will not be able to take an image.

When taking an image of an entity, make sure to center the entity on your screen. Also make sure that you are not further than 128 blocks from the entity.$(br)When taking an image from a biome, make sure that you stand inside the biome when taking the image.
